keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.helpText: Press Ctrl + any key to set the shortcut

serverForm.title: Comments Server URL
serverForm.subtitle: Configure the URL for your comments server
serverForm.setupGuideText: Don't have your own server setup? Follow this
serverForm.setupGuideTextContinued: to run the server locally with Docker and then
serverForm.offlineModeInfo: You can also run the application in offline mode! Added comments will be shown in real-time until you refresh the page. Perfect for quick prototyping and testing.

projectForm.subtitle: Start a new code review by entering a GitHub repository URL

setupPage.title: Code Comments Dashboard
setupPage.subtitle: Manage your code review sessions
setupPage.errorLoadingExistingProjects: There was an error loading existing projects from the selected server. Please, check the server URL or switch to offline mode in settings.

codeReviewPage.noFilesFoundSubtext: Set up a project on the Home page
codeReviewPage.noFileSelectedSubtext: Please select a file to view its comments

overviewPage.title: Comments Overview
overviewPage.subtitle: Review all comments across your codebase

notFoundPage.subtitle: Page Not Found
notFoundPage.content: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
